cause.description:
In addition to making available biodegradable packaging to consumers worldwide, we will engage in the education of our customers concerning their purchasing decisions, and the impact that these decisions have on our environment. We will accomplish this by providing information that will inspire consumers to actively participate in the task of preserving the integrity of our environment for future generations.
www.ecogreenproducts.com
1. To protect marine life.
2. To avoid white polution and warming effects.
3. To educate consumers. Forget plastics, buy compostables.
cause.mission: Offer biodegradable packaging to consumers worldwide.
cause.name: PACK SMART, PACK BIODEGRADABLE.
